org.apache.lucene.search.suggest.document

Class CompletionWeight

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Weight
      • org.apache.lucene.search.suggest.document.CompletionWeight

  • public class CompletionWeight
extends Weight
    Expert: the Weight for CompletionQuery, used to score and explain these queries. Subclasses can override setNextMatch(IntsRef), boost() and context() to calculate the boost and extract the context of a matched path prefix.
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

      • setNextMatch

        protected void setNextMatch(IntsRef pathPrefix)
        Set for every partial path in the index that matched the query automaton. Subclasses should override boost() and context() to return an appropriate value with respect to the current pathPrefix.
        Parameters:
        pathPrefix - the prefix of a matched path

      • boost

        protected float boost()
        Returns the boost of the partial path set by setNextMatch(IntsRef)
        Returns:
        suggestion query-time boost

      • context

        protected CharSequence context()
        Returns the context of the partial path set by setNextMatch(IntsRef)
        Returns:
        suggestion context
